miniExpansion:DefaultUncommonSkill.NAME: A Better Defend
miniExpansion:DefaultUncommonSkill.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Plated Armor. Affected by Dexterity.

miniExpansion:DefaultRareSkill.NAME: For Each Loop x2
miniExpansion:DefaultRareSkill.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable to all enemies, 2 times.
miniExpansion:DefaultRareSkill.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable to all enemies, 3 times.

miniExpansion:DefaultRarePower.NAME: In-Progress Form
miniExpansion:DefaultRarePower.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, play a TOUCH.

miniExpansion:DefaultAttackWithVariable.NAME: Special Strike
miniExpansion:DefaultAttackWithVariable.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage [E] times. NL (Deal !miniExpansion:ENERGY_DAMAGE! damage total.)

miniExpansion:DefaultSecondMagicNumberSk.NAME: Cool 2 Number Card
miniExpansion:DefaultSecondMagicNumberSk.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable and !miniExpansion:SecondMagic! poison to an enemy.
